summary: Push Day workout plan designed to help build muscle and strength, targeting chest, triceps, and shoulders. Duration: 1 hour.

exercises.name: Flat Bench Press
exercises.description: Perform a bench press on a flat bench, targeting the chest, triceps, and shoulders. Focus on proper form and controlled movements.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.description: Perform a bench press on an incline bench, targeting the upper chest, triceps, and shoulders. Adjust the bench angle for desired difficulty.
